education.studyType: Master of Science in Machine Learning
Bachelor of Science in Data Science and Finance (summa cum laude)

work.name: TikTok, Global Business Solutions, Data Cycling Center, AI Research
work.summary: Developed an open-world video tagging system for large-scale recommendation, expanding the tag space from raw model outputs to a structured, high-coverage entity taxonomy.

work.name: TCL Technology, AI Research Lab
work.summary: Designed and optimized a multi-intent understanding pipeline for smart AC voice control using large language models, improving intent parsing and command execution accuracy in a production system launched in December 2024.

work.name: RedNote (Xiaohongshu 小红书)
work.summary: Enhanced chatbot reasoning with few-shot and Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting, improving quality of multi-round query resolution.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
